tuning_runs.notes: 10% with 2 sensors, 90% with 3+ sensors. Subset selection is possible.

config.description: Test correlation between subset and full RMSE

tuning_runs.notes: Subset RMSE is NOT a reliable proxy for full RMSE. Ranking correlation too low.

tuning_runs.result: FAILED - RMSE is not bottleneck, no computational benefit
tuning_runs.notes: RMSE: ~0.1ms, Simulation: ~1200ms. Reducing sensors saves negligible time.

finding: Subset RMSE has r=0.68 correlation with full RMSE (scoring criterion). This is proxy optimization which failed catastrophically in weighted loss (-14%). No computational benefit. sensor_optimization family EXHAUSTED.
